ing: 3 inch piece fresh ginger, or more to taste
n: Lemon, Ginger, and Cinnamon Flavored Water
des: "This is a healthy alternative to flavored bottled water for just pennies per serving."
ins: Wash lemons and ginger. Slice lemons; peel and thinly slice ginger. Place lemon slices, ginger slices, and cinnamon sticks in a large pitcher; fill container with water. Store in refrigerator.
